Scene-1.name: Narrator
Scene-1.text: You wake up in a prison. You are lost within your own thoughts. Your crimes cloud you, unknown as to what you have done to deserve such punishment.

Scene-1.name: Neighbor
Scene-1.text: "Hello, I see you are awake" Your ears meet before your eyes with your cell mate who claims "today's your lucky day"

Scene-1.name: Narrator
Scene-1.text: You are fated to die today at dawn. You are unaware of why, but the world knows. The prison knows. Everybody knowsâ€¦

Scene-1.name: Narrator
Scene-1.text: You must escape, and the sirens of roll call may be your best chance of salvation.
